column1: Smoque BBQ////I've been here twice and the first time was 3 years ago. I don't usually critique food that harsh because I'm not a picky eater. However
column2: if there is a place that serve the same food
column3: then I usually reference that and make a judgment. I'm really picky about BBQ food because the most amazing BBQ place I have ever been to is 'Phil's BBQ' in San Diego
column4: CA. That place is heaven on earth for BBQ food. I've had everything on the menu here and everything's good... but not great. With that said
column5: this place does get crowded I guess cause for Chicago there's not many BBQ place. Overall for me though
column6: this place is ok but don't take my word for it
column7: try it yourself cause your palette is probably different from mine.
